agentsPortfolioPage.problemText: Specific business logic requires much more than generic chat tools.
agentsPortfolioPage.solutionText: Dedicated AI agents with internal knowledge, custom workflows, and API integrations.
agentsPortfolioPage.effectText: Precise internal support, automatic decision-making, and streamlining complex processes.
agentsPortfolioPage.descriptionP1: AI agents are the next stage of automation evolution. Unlike simple chatbots, they can perform actions, make decisions based on complex data, and integrate with existing business tools.
agentsPortfolioPage.descriptionP2: The Gemini Chatbot App template shows how combining advanced Google Gemini language models with the n8n workflow automation platform allows for the creation of intelligent agents handling customer support, data analysis, and reporting.

aiappsPortfolioPage.problemText: Specific business logic needs require more than generic tools.
aiappsPortfolioPage.solutionText: Dedicated creative AI applications with internal knowledge and business logic.
aiappsPortfolioPage.effectText: Precise internal support and automatic decision-making.
aiappsPortfolioPage.descriptionP1: Creative AI applications go beyond simple text generation. They combine the reasoning power of large language models with specific business logic and creative tools.
aiappsPortfolioPage.descriptionP2: The Gemini Chatbot App provides a solid foundation for building such applications, using n8n workflows to handle complex logic and integrations, allowing AI to operate in the context of real business needs.

webappsPortfolioPage.problemText: Standard CMS platforms limit flexibility for complex, custom interfaces.
webappsPortfolioPage.solutionText: Modern React / Next.js applications, such as Open WebUI.
webappsPortfolioPage.effectText: Efficient, scalable, and fully customized digital products.
webappsPortfolioPage.descriptionP1: When ready-made solutions are no longer enough, we create dedicated web applications tailored exactly to business needs. Using modern frameworks like React and Next.js, we build fast, scalable, and interactive user interfaces.
webappsPortfolioPage.descriptionP2: Integrations with Open WebUI show how to create consistent, custom frontend layers for complex backend systems, providing users with an intuitive environment to work with advanced AI models and automations.

ecommercePortfolioPage.problemText: Managing complex online stores and stock levels.
ecommercePortfolioPage.solutionText: Shopify and WooCommerce stores integrated with AI automations.
ecommercePortfolioPage.effectText: Automated inventory management, product descriptions, and multi-language support.
ecommercePortfolioPage.descriptionP1: Modern e-commerce is more than just a sales website. It requires intelligent systems that automate operational processes. For the After Rave project, we implemented an advanced Shopify solution enhanced with AI workflows handling inventory, product descriptions, and customer inquiries.
ecommercePortfolioPage.descriptionP2: Our approach focuses on creating high-conversion stores that largely operate autonomously. By integrating tools like Make.com and dedicated AI agents, we combine classic e-commerce with the future of autonomous commerce.

webPortfolioPage.solutionText: Ultra-fast SEO-ready website with AI integration.
webPortfolioPage.effectText: Higher conversion and better Google rankings.

chatbotsPage.effectText: Reduces response time and automates support.

voicebotsPage.solutionText: Voice AI answering calls exactly like a human.

title.three: Step by step through our joint process of delivering personalized solutions

step1.title: Consultation and brief
step1.description1: We start with a conversation to thoroughly understand your needs, expectations, and goals.
step1.description2: We discuss requirements during consultations via Slack, WhatsApp, or Messenger. We create a project brief and analyze the current state (if one exists).
step1.description3: We gather all relevant information that will form the basis for designing the best solution and document it in Notion or Trello.

step2.title: Solution selection and strategy
step2.description1: Based on the collected data, we select the most effective technologies, tools, and implementation methods.
step2.description2: We create a clear action plan, establish a timeline, KPIs, and work distribution.
step2.description3: We document and coordinate the entire process in Notion or Trello, with ongoing communication via Slack or WhatsApp.

step3.title: Implementation and testing
step3.description1: We begin execution - designing, coding, and implementing the solution according to the strategy.
step3.description2: We use technologies like React, Next.js, or AI API integrations, and finally conduct detailed technical and UX testing.
step3.description3: We maintain smooth communication throughout and update statuses in Notion or your preferred work tool.

step4.title: Delivery and optimization
step4.description1: We hand over the completed solution along with instructions and a user manual (in PDF format or video recording).
step4.description2: We train you on how to use it, then monitor performance and analyze system operation data.
step4.description3: We provide optimization, technical support, and further development - we're with you even after implementation.

privacy.head: PRIVACY POLICY AND COOKIES MACAI.STUDIO
privacy.desc1: GENERAL PROVISIONS - This Privacy Policy defines the principles of processing and protection of personal data of Customers of the Internet Platform https://macai.studio (hereinafter referred to as the Platform), operated by Piotr Machowski (hereinafter referred to as the Administrator). The Administrator makes every effort to process personal data of Customers in accordance with applicable laws, in particular with Regulation (EU) 2016/679 of the European Parliament and of the Council of 27 April 2016 on the protection of natural persons with regard to the processing of personal data and on the free movement of such data, and repealing Directive 95/46/EC (General Data Protection Regulation).
privacy.desc2: The Administrator processes personal data of Customers necessary to fulfill orders, including: first name, last name, email address, phone number, delivery address. Additionally, while using the Platform, the Administrator may collect information about the Customer's activity, such as: history of visited pages, and for the purposes of handling forms and project quotes.
privacy.head3: §3. PURPOSE AND LEGAL BASIS FOR DATA PROCESSING
privacy.desc3: Personal data of Customers is processed for the purpose of: a) performance of the concluded Sales Agreement (Article 6(1)(b) GDPR), b) fulfillment of legal obligations incumbent on the Administrator, e.g. issuing invoices (Article 6(1)(c) GDPR), c) direct marketing of the Administrator's products and services (Article 6(1)(f) GDPR). Providing personal data is voluntary, but necessary to fulfill an order on the Platform.
privacy.desc4: Personal data of Customers may be disclosed to entities providing services to the Administrator, such as: IT providers, accounting offices, etc. Personal data of Customers will not be transferred outside the European Economic Area.
privacy.desc5: Customers have the right to access their personal data, rectify, delete, restrict processing, transfer data, object, and withdraw consent to data processing. To exercise their rights, Customers may contact the Administrator electronically at piotr@macai.studio.
privacy.desc6: This Privacy Policy enters into force on 22.05.2024. The Administrator reserves the right to amend this Privacy Policy. Customers will be informed of any changes electronically.
privacy.cook1: Cookies - small text files sent by a www server and stored on the user's end device (e.g. computer, smartphone) when using websites. Session cookies - cookies deleted after the browser session ends. Persistent cookies - cookies remaining on the user's device for a specified time. First-party cookies - cookies placed by the website the user is currently visiting. Third-party cookies - cookies placed by sites other than the visited website.
privacy.cook2: The Administrator uses the following types of cookies: a) Necessary for the operation of the Store: Storing the contents of the cart, Remembering user login, Adapting displayed content to the user. b) Functional: Remembering user preferences (e.g. language, region), Remembering page appearance settings. c) Analytical: Measuring traffic on the page to improve its functioning, Generating anonymous statistics and reports. d) Marketing: Personalizing ads displayed to the user, Analyzing the effectiveness of marketing campaigns.
privacy.headcook2: §2. TYPES AND PURPOSES OF USING COOKIES
privacy.cook3: Cookies are used for the purpose of: a) Ensuring proper operation and security of the Store, b) Analyzing traffic on the site and optimizing the Store's functionality, c) Adapting content and functionality to user preferences, d) Conducting marketing and advertising activities.
privacy.cook4: The user can change browser settings at any time to block the storage of cookies or delete already stored cookies. Blocking or deleting cookies may cause difficulties in using the Store or disable some of its functions. The user can withdraw consent to the use of cookies at any time by changing browser settings.
privacy.cook5: The Store's website may also include cookies from third parties, such as: a) Analytical service providers (e.g. Google Analytics), b) Advertising service providers (e.g. Google Ads), c) Entities providing social media plugins. Third-party cookies are subject to separate privacy policies of those entities
privacy.cook6: For matters related to the use of cookies on the Store's website, the user can contact the Administrator at the email address: piotr@macai.studio. The user has the right to lodge a complaint with the supervisory authority (President of the Personal Data Protection Office) regarding violations of personal data protection regulations.
privacy.cook7: This Cookie Policy enters into force on 01.05.2024. The Administrator reserves the right to amend this Cookie Policy. Customers will be informed of any changes electronically.

FeaturesTab.tab1Description2: I create unique graphic designs that combine modern trends with functionality, ensuring each solution is tailored to your brand and audience. My designs improve brand recognition and help build lasting relationships with customers.
FeaturesTab.tab2Description1: Design user interfaces that are simple to use and tailored to your clients' needs. I specialize in creating user experiences (UX) and user interfaces (UI) that merge aesthetics with intuitive navigation.
FeaturesTab.tab2Description2: My approach to UX/UI is based on in-depth research and analysis of user behavior. I design interfaces that enhance engagement, minimize user friction, and increase overall satisfaction.
FeaturesTab.tab3Description1: Leverage artificial intelligence to automatically create videos, graphics, and product photography that fully reflect the professionalism of your business. I offer AI-driven services for creating personalized visual content tailored to your needs.
FeaturesTab.tab3Description2: Using advanced generative algorithms, I produce visual content that includes high-quality product photography, attractive promotional graphics, and dynamic videos—all based on your preferences and requirements. I enable full automation and personalization of creative processes, ensuring your visual materials are always top-notch.

header1.desc1: I offer comprehensive design and UX/UI services that help you build your dream image in the digital world. My solutions are tailored to your needs and industry, ensuring consistency and efficiency in every aspect of your business.

header2.desc1: Harness the full potential of modern tools and marketing strategies for effective lead generation and dynamic social media growth. With my services, combining advanced technologies with deep expertise, I offer comprehensive solutions tailored to your needs and market specifics, together taking your business to the next level.

FeaturesTab.tab1Description1: Transform your customer interactions with custom AI chatbots designed specifically for your business needs. Our chatbots provide 24/7 automated support, handle inquiries, and streamline customer service operations efficiently.
FeaturesTab.tab1Description2: Each chatbot is built with advanced natural language processing capabilities and trained on your business data to provide accurate, contextual responses that align with your brand voice and customer service standards.
FeaturesTab.tab2Description1: Empower your business operations with smart virtual assistants that can handle complex tasks, schedule appointments, manage workflows, and provide real-time assistance to both employees and customers.
FeaturesTab.tab2Description2: Our virtual assistants learn from interactions and continuously improve their performance, offering personalized experiences while reducing operational costs and increasing productivity.
FeaturesTab.tab3Description1: Revolutionize your customer support with AI systems that can understand, analyze, and respond to customer queries across multiple channels. Our solutions integrate seamlessly with your existing platforms to provide consistent support.
FeaturesTab.tab3Description2: Leverage machine learning algorithms to predict customer needs, automate routine inquiries, and escalate complex issues to human agents when necessary. Our AI support systems help maintain high customer satisfaction while optimizing resource allocation.

header1.desc1: We implement advanced AI-powered Chatbots and Voicebots that revolutionize how your company handles customer service. My solutions are tailored to your industry’s specifics, automating interactions and improving service quality, leading to increased customer satisfaction and operational efficiency.

header2.desc1: Harness the full potential of artificial intelligence to transform your business. By combining advanced AI technologies with deep business expertise, I offer solutions that automate processes, optimize costs, and enhance customer satisfaction, helping your company gain a competitive edge.

header1.header3: AI Agents and Assistants with Built-In Automations
header1.header4: Intelligent Automations for Efficient Customer Service
header1.desc1: We specialize in creating AI assistants and agents with built-in integrations with the most popular CRM, CMS, and other business tools. I offer comprehensive solutions that automate processes and provide efficient customer service by integrating advanced technologies with your existing systems.

header2.desc1: I create advanced integration solutions that connect AI chatbots and assistants with your business systems. My solutions support multi-channel communication, real-time analytics, and personalized customer interactions.
